text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/claim-supporting-info-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
acquired-condition-indicator Acquired Condition IndicatorAn indicator if the patient on the claim has a Health Care Acquired Condition
admission-hour Admission hourHour of medical facility admission, expressed in military time (00-23)
capitated-claim-indicator Capitated claim indicatorAn indicator that all services on the claim were capitated services
capitated-service-indicator Capitated service indicatorAn indicator that this service (encounter record) was capitated
compound-indicator Drug compound indicator
days-long-term-care-recipient-on-leave Days longterm care recipient on leave
days-count Days countThe number of inpatient days for the facility Claim
days-covered Days covered
days-not-covered Days not covered
discharge-hour Discharge hourHour of medical facility discharge, expressed in military time (00-23)
network-provider-indicator Network provider indicatorIndicates if the servicing provider participates in the network to which the patient belongs
newborn-length-of-stay Newbord length of stay
refill-number Refill numberA number indicating the original prescription or the refill number. This is the refill number, not the number of refills remaining.

name: ClaimSupportingInfoTypeCodeSystem
title: Claim Supporting Info Type Codes
description: Supporting information type codes for claims

concept.definition: An indicator if the patient on the  claim has a Health Care Acquired Condition

An indicator that this service (encounter record) was capitated

concept.display: Days longterm care recipient on leave

concept.definition: The number of inpatient days for the facility Claim
Hour of medical facility discharge, expressed in military time (00-23)
Indicates if the servicing provider participates in the network to which the patient belongs
A number indicating the original prescription or the refill number. This is the refill number, not the number of refills remaining.
